title: Internet connection
body: Hello,so today i got 1 problem , i got in queue and started the game but the error popped out that i have internet connection problems,but my internet works fine everything runs smoothly... and now i`ve got leaver ,some knows whats happening ?

replies.body: It's probably not a problem with your internet overall but rather just an issue where your network is having problems connecting to our servers for some weird reason. There are a few different things that can cause that, but let's start by switching to ethernet if you can to be sure that connection is stable, but also try adjusting your DNS settings to 8.8.8.8/8.8.4.4, which you can find help with in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) if you need!

I have this same bug

Windows 8.1 all latest patches and driver software
GTX 950M with 390.65 Nvidia Driver
Intel i7 4720HQ CPU @ 2.6 GHZ
7.89 RAM

Kaespersky is my antivirus but I already have it set so League can update DLL's 
Client works fine it is when I try to connect to the game that everything stops working happens on both my accounts and is reproducible.
I have Time Warner Cable Spectrum
